note.p: Naval officer. Lieutenant on HMS Liffey, 1861. Captain and commander on the Repulse, 1873. Lived in retirement in Bishop’s Stortford, Hertfordshire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/4440/244/1), 1911 (RG14/7492/352)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 November 2017)
